pages.text: I have done my best to make these texts easy to read by associating certain colors with different things.$(br2)It should be decently self-explanatory, but here is a key to understand what color means what.$(br2)

pages.title: Key
pages.text: $(li)$(item)This color represents an item of some kind.$()$(br2)$(li)$(place)This color represents a place or location.$()$(br2)$(li)$(action)This color represents an action.$()$(br2)$(li)$(thing)This color represents a thing or concept.$()$(br2)$(li)$(entity)This color represents a creature of some kind.$()
